比如input係 [eat]，就要搵到[dat],[ect],[ear]咁樣
有冇少少tips係可以點做

純algorithm 我會諗到將個wordlist放落一個array
之後user input完將個字用loop同array入面既字比較
同長度就compare有幾多個字母一樣 如果一樣既字母係長度-1即係有1個字母唔同 就return 俾user
如果唔同長度就skip

利申：唔識寫C

#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

int main(){
int i=0, j=0;
int array[1024][20];
char word;

FILE *wordlist;
wordlist = fopen("wordlist.txt","r");


while(fgetc(wordlist)!=EOF){
word= fgetc(wordlist);
printf("%c",word);
}
fclose(wordlist);

return 0;
}

fgetc() call左兩次

int main(){
int i=0, j=0;
int array[1024][20];
char word;

FILE *wordlist;
wordlist = fopen("wordlist.txt","r");

do{
word= fgetc(wordlist);
printf("%c",word);
}
while(word!=EOF);

fclose(wordlist);

return 0;
}

唔知你卡係邊, 亦唔知你解決左未, 不過我建議你不如拆開function做, 會唔會冇咁易亂?

(以下不擔保syntax, 請自行修改)

bool compare(char[] a, char[] b)
{
unmatch = 0
for i = 0 to a.length-1 do
if (a[i] != b[i])
{
unmatch++;
if unmatch > 1 return false
}
return true
}

然後再處理外面個data structure

唔知你卡係邊, 亦唔知你解決左未, 不過我建議你不如拆開function做, 會唔會冇咁易亂?

(以下不擔保syntax, 請自行修改)

bool compare(char[] a, char[] b)
{
unmatch = 0
for i = 0 to a.length-1 do
if (a[i] != b[i])
{
unmatch++;
if unmatch > 1 return false
}
return true
}

然後再處理外面個data structure


我明你做緊咩但係char a, char b個length可以唔同
所以呢個compare要加多啲先做到

解錯題，
用 bucket sort啦

解錯題，
用 bucket sort啦


呢個唔識

如果係algorithm 的話op 應該已經學咗time complexity

首先講講你呢題既context
你有一個wordlist, (唔係set / dictionary 而係list )
word look up time complexity = O(N)
N 係number of words in the list

naive 方法係成個list compare 一次，呢個已經有巴打提過了
time complexity = O(N * M)
M 係 input word 既長度 (number of letters)
因係你worst case 要做N 次comparison
而每次comparison worst case 係 要compare M 咁多個letters

老實講如果你只係想 搵exactly一次答案的話 我都諗唔到complexity 特別好既方法

不過如果你要連續搵Q 個input 答案的話，上面既方法complexity 係 O(N*M*Q)
當你個wordlist有 1 million 個words ,
每個word at most 10 letters 咁長
query 1000次答案
咁既情況下連超級電腦都會計唔到呢題

naive 既方法每次query 都做N 次word comparison
如果你有快啲既方法知道 一個word 存唔存在於 wordlist 中， 你其實可以用第二招
例： input = cat
其實你只需要搵下呢三個case 會唔會搵到一個 word in your wordlist
[a-z]at
c[a-z]t
ca[a-z]

當然，list 既search complexity 係O(N)，你需要其他data structure

講住咁多先

兩樣都冇限啊

#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

int main(){
int i, j;
int len;
int cmp;
char word[256];
char in[256];
char temp[256];
char letter[27] ="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";

FILE *fp;
fp = fopen("wordlist.txt","r");

printf("Please input the word for comparison\n");
scanf("%s",&in);
len= strlen(in);

if (fp == NULL) {
printf("Unable to open file.");
return 0;
}
else{
while(fgets(word,20,fp) != NULL){
if (len == strlen(word)-1){
for(i=0; i<len; i++){
for(j=0; j<26; j++){
strncpy(temp, in, len);
temp[i]= letter[j];
cmp= strncmp(word, temp,len);
if(cmp==0){
printf("%s",word);
}
}
}
}
}
}
fclose(fp);
return 0;
}

char in[256];

char letter[27] ="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";

FILE *fp;

printf("Please input the word for comparison\n");

}

}
}
}
fclose(fp);

}

唔知你卡係邊, 亦唔知你解決左未, 不過我建議你不如拆開function做, 會唔會冇咁易亂?

(以下不擔保syntax, 請自行修改)

bool compare(char[] a, char[] b)
{
unmatch = 0
for i = 0 to a.length-1 do
if (a[i] != b[i])
{
unmatch++;
if unmatch > 1 return false
}
return true
}

然後再處理外面個data structure


我明你做緊咩但係char a, char b個length可以唔同
所以呢個compare要加多啲先做到
btw thx bros

其實我覺得呢個巴打段嘢係最好，我我唔明點解a同b個len會唔同，因為題目係a同b之間只有一個英文字母唔一樣。只不過佢係應該unmatch=1先return true。

其次，你宜家段嘢真係幾難睇，完全無modular一舊嘢，其實一個好嘅program，除咗work仲要好睇，例如有個function去讀file，有個function做呢個咁特別嘅comparison

咁基本既野好難教得你明

明我唸咩, 特別for樓主讀緊algorithm既話拆件擊破好重要, 所有題目requirement撈曬係幾行係好辛苦好難受 利申: 當年Algorithm幾科全A

冇條題目係手只可以靠估估下, 一係就
if a.length != b.length then return false,
一係就

bool compare(char[] a, char[] b)
{
unmatch = 0
longstring = a.length > b.length? a : b
shortstring = a.length > b.length? b : a
for i = 0 to longstring.length-1 do
----for j = 0 to shortstring.length-1 do
--------if (longstring[i] != shortstring[i])
--------{
------------unmatch++;
------------if unmatch == 1 return false
--------}
----return true
}
感覺基本上就係做緊subarray系列問題, 如果你要好既time complexity應該係要用返divide and conquer系列既思路, 當然code難度同長度都會飆升, 唔知你題目需唔需要呢點所以就冇深究啦

(以下不擔保syntax, 請自行修改)

bool compare(char[] a, char[] b)
{
unmatch = 0
for i = 0 to a.length-1 do
if (a[i] != b[i])
{
unmatch++;
if unmatch > 1 return false
}
return true
}

然後再處理外面個data structure


我明你做緊咩但係char a, char b個length可以唔同
所以呢個compare要加多啲先做到
btw thx bros

其實我覺得呢個巴打段嘢係最好，我我唔明點解a同b個len會唔同，因為題目係a同b之間只有一個英文字母唔一樣。只不過佢係應該unmatch=1先return true。

其次，你宜家段嘢真係幾難睇，完全無modular一舊嘢，其實一個好嘅program，除咗work仲要好睇，例如有個function去讀file，有個function做呢個咁特別嘅comparison

明我唸咩, 特別for樓主讀緊algorithm既話拆件擊破好重要, 所有題目requirement撈曬係幾行係好辛苦好難受 利申: 當年Algorithm幾科全A

冇條題目係手只可以靠估估下, 一係就
if a.length != b.length then return false,
一係就

bool compare(char[] a, char[] b)
{
unmatch = 0
longstring = a.length > b.length? a : b
shortstring = a.length > b.length? b : a
for i = 0 to longstring.length-1 do
----for j = 0 to shortstring.length-1 do
--------if (longstring[i] != shortstring[i])
--------{
------------unmatch++;
------------if unmatch == 1 return false
--------}
----return true
}
